short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin to help save your eyes when you have to work on a NSFW site. Replaces all img tags with pictures of kittens.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin is useful when you need to work on a site that is NSFW. It will replace all of the images on the page with images of kittens. It will keep track of domains you've saved previously, and you have the option of clearing your saved list.
